channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver

item.title: CVE-2023-0021|2024-08-02T04:54:32.586Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver
item.description: Due to insufficient encoding of user input, SAP NetWeaver - versions 700, 701, 702, 731, 740, 750, allows an unauthenticated attacker to inject code that may expose sensitive data like user ID and password, which could lead to reflected Cross-Site scripting. These endpoints are normally exposed over the network and successful exploitation can partially impact confidentiality of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-27898|2024-08-02T00:41:55.785Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver
item.description: SAP NetWeaver application, due to insufficient input validation, allows an attacker to send a crafted request from a vulnerable web application targeting internal systems behind firewalls that are normally inaccessible to an attacker from the external network, resulting in a Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability. Thus, having a low impact on confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2024-27898|2024-04-09T00:52:54.390Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver
item.description: SAP NetWeaver application, due to insufficient input validation, allows an attacker to send a crafted request from a vulnerable web application targeting internal systems behind firewalls that are normally inaccessible to an attacker from the external network, resulting in a Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability. Thus, having a low impact on confidentiality.
